title: IISER Kolkata Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Junior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Kolkata (ISSER Kolkata) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech and M.Sc. can apply for the IISER Kolkata Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the...
